>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Index Element

id:: td-000016

######################################################################

This SML file contains an 'index' data element.  The 'index' statement
tells an application that the block of text is the text of an index
entry.  The index is rendered as part of the backmatter of the
document.

index:: backmatter

index:: SML; index; data element; statement; application; block; block
of text; index!entry; backmatter

<<<DOCUMENT
